Festember
NIT Trichy Campus, Thuvakudi
Festember is the annual cultural festival of National Institute of Technology, Tiruchirappalli also known as NIT, Trichy. It is a 4-day event held usually in September.
Pragyan 2018 is an ISO 9001 & 20121 certified annual International Techno-management Organisation of the National Institute of Technology, Tiruchirappalli

Ranganathaswamy Temple
Srirangam, Tiruchirappalli
Expansive, lavishly decorated temple complex dating back more than 1,000 years, with 7 enclosures.
Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu. It is constructed on a 83 metres high rock.
Naturally protected fort on a huge outcrop with a temple & caves, accessible by 400 stone steps.
